examples.0: Does not consistently exhibit anything from 1-4
examples.1:
Follows best practices as outlined by the team as it relates to development.
Follows software development life-cycle (source control, change management)
Understands core SQL syntax and can take a documented business problem and translate it to SQL with accurate results.
Understands how to create database objects (stored procedures, tables, views, etc.)
Modifies existing solutions in respective specialty (applications, SSIS, SSAS, SQL, Tableau, SSRS, etc. )
Extends existing data models
Makes modifications to existing cubes
examples.2:
Activity identifies and makes recommendations for improvements in our engineering processes
Identifies and resolves roll-specific on-call responsibilities (short-term fixes)
Jumps in to code they did not write and can interpret and debug it.
Profiles data, looking for inconsistencies and completeness.
Performance tunes SQL queries.
Implements performance strategies (indexes, query optimization, scaling strategies , etc.)
Explores and implements new tools and technology
Understands inter system dependencies.
Follows design patterns that the team has established.
Creates new data models that represent the source system (i.e. SRC models)
Creates new SSIS packages, or similar integration tools, to bring in new data elements.
Demonstrated ability to create new cube solutions
examples.3:
Breaks down complex code in to simpler solutions (i.e. refactoring code, table structures, etc.)
Creates, automates and implements improvements to our engineering processes.
Establishes standards best practices for the team.
Implements root-cause resolution to on-call issues (long-term fixes)
Leverages advanced debugging techniques and tools and promotes them.
Shares and holds the team accountable for following standards and best practices.
Identified and Resolves security flaws / solutions.
Establishes benchmarks for our solutions (applications, data sets, ETLs, etc.)
Implements advanced performance strategies (partitioning, compression, etc.)
Creates dimensional models that represents the business domain.
Understanding of and some experience building in our client facing tools (i.e. Tableau, SSRS)
